org.apache.logging.log4j.core.selector

接口 NamedContextSelector

  • 所有超级接口:
    ContextSelector
    所有已知实现类:
    JndiContextSelector

    public interface NamedContextSelector
extends ContextSelector
    ContextSelectors that have a name.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      LoggerContext locateContext(String name, Object externalContext, URI configLocation)
      Locate the LoggerContext with the specified name.
      LoggerContext removeContext(String name)
      Locate the LoggerContext with the specified name using the default configuration.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.logging.log4j.core.selector.ContextSelector

        getContext, getContext, getLoggerContexts, removeContext

    • 方法详细资料

      • locateContext

        LoggerContext locateContext(String name,
                            Object externalContext,
                            URI configLocation)
        Locate the LoggerContext with the specified name.
        参数:
        name - The LoggerContext name.
        externalContext - The external context to associate with the LoggerContext.
        configLocation - The location of the configuration.
        返回:
        A LoggerContext.

      • removeContext

        LoggerContext removeContext(String name)
        Locate the LoggerContext with the specified name using the default configuration.
        参数:
        name - The LoggerContext name.
        返回:
        A LoggerContext.
